original_text: And upon this came his disciples, and marvelled that he talked with the woman: yet no man said, What seekest thou? or, Why talkest thou with her?
korean_text: 이 때에 제자들이 돌아와서 예수께서 여자와 말씀하시는 것을 이상히 여겼으나 무엇을 구하시나이까 어찌하여 그와 말씀하시나이까 묻는 자가 없더라

sentences.original_text: And upon this came his disciples
and marvelled that he talked with the woman
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 여자와 대화하는 것을 보고 놀랐다

sentences.original_text: or, Why talkest thou with her?
